Chat API.¶

Adding room.¶

class chat.views.room.AddRoomView(**kwargs)¶

Adds room or return an existed (ChatRoom.get_room_or_create(owner,abonent)).

Marks messages as readed (room.mark_as_readed(owner)).

METHOD: POST

URL: room/add

INPUT: json

{owner: int, abonent: int}

OUTPUT:

{
    "abonent_id":26,
    "id":14,
    "is_current":true,
    "is_active":false,
    "is_low_account":false,
    "activity":1575295588.831875,
    "messages":{ "90":
                  {
                    "id":90,
                    "message":"...",
                    "author_id":7,
                    "created":"",
                    "is_readed":false
                    } ...
                }
}

List of rooms.¶

class chat.views.room.RoomList(**kwargs)¶

List of rooms.

Serialize all rooms by the profile of caller.

serialize_rooms(request.user.userprofile)

METHOD: GET

URL: room/list

Input: None

Output:

{
contact_users: {
7: { id: 7,
     account: "0",
     language: "en",
     gender: "male",
     username: "man6",
     email: "man6@gmail.com",…}
}
contacts_ids: [23, ...]
current_room: 14
online_ids: [2,...]
room_ids: [12,...]
rooms: {
         12: {
            abonent_id: 23
            activity: 1575202813
            id: 12
            is_active: false
            is_current: false
            is_low_account: false
            messages: {
                14: {
                    abonent_id: 26,
                    id: 14,
                    is_current: true,
                    is_active: false,
                    is_low_account: false,…}
            }
         }

Sending the message.¶

class chat.views.message.SendMessageView(**kwargs)¶

Send message to room.

Check room activity to avoid loose money.

Mark as readed for current room.

METHOD: POST

URL: room/list

Input:

{
    author: {
        account: "0"
        email: "man6@gmail.com"
        gender: "male"
        groups: []
        id: 7
        is_camera: false
        is_online: true
        is_superuser: false
        language: "en"
        last_feed: {
            id: 35,
            title: "Test feed of man6 5",
            main_media: { id: 173,
                            type_media: "photo", orient: "port",…
                        }
            }

        main_photo: "...jpg"
        middle_photo: "....jpg"
        token: "28e3ba29c14d059c625492747cad7a27d6a3b9d4"
        username: "man6"
    }
        created: "2019-12-02T14:19:34.569Z"
        message: "vdsvdsvsd"
        room_id: 14
}

Output:

{
    abonent_id: 26
    activity: 1575296374.5969613
    id: 14
    is_active: false
    is_current: true
    is_low_account: false
    messages: {
        90: {
            id: 90,
            message: "cqwcwcw",
            author_id: 7,
            created: "2019-12-02 14:08:13.574211+00:00",…}
        ,…}

}

Selecting room.¶

class chat.views.room.SelectRoomView(**kwargs)¶

Select room from the contact list.

Mark messages as readed.

METHOD: GET

URL: room/select/id:int

Output:

{
    contact_users: {23:{}…}
    contacts_ids: [23, 26, 7]
    current_room: 12
    online_ids: [45,..]
    room_ids: [12, 14]
    rooms: {12: {}...}
}

Suspending room.¶

class chat.views.room.StopRoomView(**kwargs)¶

Suspend chat room.

room.close_room_by_stop_button()

METHOD: GET

URL: room/stop/id:int

Output:

{status: 0, message 'Ok'}

Turning streamer video ON.¶

class webrtc.views.CameraOnView(**kwargs)¶

Turn camera ON.

Set

profile.is_camera = True

Publish data to socket to broadcust all users for updating user`s profile.

data = { ‘task’: ‘update_user’, ‘user’: {profile.id: user_serializer(profile)} } redis_client.publish(‘notifications’, json.dumps(data))

Response({‘camera_on’: ‘ok’})

METHOD: GET

URL: webrtc/cameraOn

Input: None

Output:

{"camera_on":"ok"}

Turning streamer video OFF.¶

class webrtc.views.CameraOffView(**kwargs)¶

Turn camera ON.

Set

profile.is_camera = False

Publish data to socket to broadcust all users for updating user`s profile.

data = { ‘task’: ‘update_user’, ‘user’: {profile.id: user_serializer(profile)} } redis_client.publish(‘notifications’, json.dumps(data))

Response({‘camera_off’: ‘ok’})

METHOD: GET

URL: webrtc/cameraOff

Input: None

Output:

{"camera_off":"ok"}
